name: Rocko's Quest
description: Rocko must journey through several themed environments, including swamps, mountains, castles and caves, while fending off a variety of beastly assailants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/98/98SE/Me/XP Processor: Pentium 2 300 MHz Memory: 64 MB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: i opened my eyes to find myself in a white void, it seemed to infinitely expand in every direction, about ten feet away from me was a lone desktop computer, it wasnt connected to anything but it managed to work. the desktop was covered in nine hundred and ninety nine copies of rockos quest, i began to play... bacon cheese eggs dormant rage

someone has beautifully crafted a world that I would much rather live in than my current one, for the past three days I have not consumed any food or water, I have not slept either. This game is so immursive i feel like I am Rocko. My old life is meaningless, all that matters is Rocko... 10/10
Fought a bear and a tree got killed then my game crashed.
